amendment.description: At the end of division H (before the short title), insert the following: Sec. XX. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to finalize the notice of proposed rulemaking entitled `Federal Motor Vehicle Safety Standards***.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 57 printed in Part B of House Report 115-295 to prohibit the use of funds for the NHTSA and FMCSA to finalize the notice of proposed rulemaking regarding speed limiting devices (81 Fed. Reg. 61941).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A030) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A030) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A030) offered by Mr. Perry.
